keyMoments.title: The Unluckies Arrive at Little Garden
keyMoments.description: Mr. 13, an otter member of Baroque Works, arrives at Little Garden with Miss Friday carrying an Eternal Pose to Arabasta from Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one half of the Unluckies, Baroque Works' messenger and executioner duo.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Mr. 13 attacks Sanji to verify his identity but is swiftly defeated along with Miss Friday.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that even Baroque Works' elite messengers are no match for a Straw Hat crew member.

abilities.description: As an otter, Mr. 13 possesses natural speed and agility for combat.

relationships.description: Mr. 13 works as a duo with Miss Friday as the Unluckies, Baroque Works' messenger and executioner team.

evolutionMoments.description: They arrive together at Little Garden with a mission from Mr. 0.

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works as one of the Unluckies
Works as a messenger and executioner for failed Baroque Works agents

keyMoments.title: The Unluckies Arrive at Little Garden
keyMoments.description: Miss Friday, a vulture member of Baroque Works, arrives at Little Garden with Mr. 13 carrying an Eternal Pose to Arabasta from Mr. 0.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one half of the Unluckies, Baroque Works' messenger and executioner duo.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Sanji
keyMoments.description: Miss Friday attacks Sanji to verify his identity but is swiftly defeated along with Mr. 13.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Sanji can easily handle multiple Baroque Works agents simultaneously.

abilities.description: As a vulture, Miss Friday can fly and attack from the air.

relationships.description: Miss Friday works as a duo with Mr. 13 as the Unluckies, Baroque Works' messenger and executioner team.

evolutionMoments.description: They arrive together at Little Garden with a mission from Mr. 0.

reveals.information: Member of Baroque Works as one of the Unluckies
Works as a messenger and executioner for failed Baroque Works agents

keyMoments.title: Impersonates Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Sanji cleverly impersonates Mr. 3 when receiving a call from Mr. 0 (Crocodile), falsely reporting that Vivi and the Straw Hats have been eliminated.
keyMoments.significance: One of Sanji's most strategic moments, demonstrating his quick thinking and intelligence beyond combat abilities. This deception secures the Eternal Pose to Arabasta.
keyMoments.quote: This is Mr. 3. The mission has been completed. Princess Vivi and the Straw Hat Pirates have all been eliminated.

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Unluckies
keyMoments.description: While maintaining the phone call with Crocodile, Sanji swiftly defeats both Mr. 13 and Miss Friday who attacked to verify his identity.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's ability to multitask in high-pressure situations, fighting while maintaining his deception.
keyMoments.quote: One of the Straw Hats was still alive, but I've taken care of it.

keyMoments.title: Secures Eternal Pose to Arabasta
keyMoments.description: After defeating the Unluckies, Sanji retrieves the Eternal Pose to Arabasta from their package.
keyMoments.significance: This action directly enables the crew to bypass normal navigation and sail straight to Arabasta, advancing the main plot.

reveals.information: Demonstrates exceptional strategic thinking and deception skills

keyMoments.title: Survives Brogy's Axe
keyMoments.description: Dorry awakens, revealing he survived Brogy's axe blow because both giants' weapons had become too dull after 100 years of fighting.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves the cliffhanger and confirms the giants' friendship remains intact despite their duel.

keyMoments.title: Uses Hakoku Technique
keyMoments.description: Dorry combines his power with Brogy to unleash Hakoku, a devastating attack that creates compressed air beams to defeat the Island Eater.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the legendary Elbaf technique Hakoku, showcasing the true power of giant warriors.

keyMoments.title: Sword Shatters
keyMoments.description: After using Hakoku, Dorry's sword completely shatters from the strain of the technique and 100 years of use.
keyMoments.significance: Symbolizes the end of the giants' century-long duel as they can no longer continue fighting.

abilities.description: A combined attack with Brogy that creates compressed air beams capable of slicing through anything.

reveals.information: Can use the legendary Elbaf technique Hakoku

keyMoments.title: Uses Hakoku Technique
keyMoments.description: Brogy combines his power with Dorry to unleash Hakoku, a devastating attack that creates compressed air beams to defeat the Island Eater.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of the legendary Elbaf technique Hakoku, showcasing the true power of giant warriors.

keyMoments.title: Axe Shatters
keyMoments.description: After using Hakoku, Brogy's axe completely shatters from the strain of the technique and 100 years of use.
keyMoments.significance: Symbolizes the end of the giants' century-long duel as they can no longer continue fighting.

abilities.description: A combined attack with Dorry that creates compressed air beams capable of slicing through anything.

reveals.information: Can use the legendary Elbaf technique Hakoku

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Calls Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Crocodile, under his codename Mr. 0, calls Mr. 3 to receive a status report on the elimination of Vivi and the Straw Hats, but is actually speaking to Sanji in disguise.
keyMoments.significance: First voice appearance of Crocodile, the main antagonist of the Arabasta Saga and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

keyMoments.title: Orders Elimination of Mr. 3
keyMoments.description: Suspicious of the false report, Crocodile orders Miss All-Sunday to have Mr. 2 Bon Clay intercept and eliminate the real Mr. 3.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Crocodile's ruthless management style and his willingness to eliminate his own subordinates on suspicion alone.
keyMoments.quote: Miss All-Sunday, contact Mr. 2. Have him eliminate Mr. 3 before he reaches Arabasta.

relationships.description: Crocodile works with Miss All-Sunday (Nico Robin) as his second-in-command in Baroque Works.

evolutionMoments.description: Crocodile gives orders to Miss All-Sunday regarding Mr. 2.

reveals.information: Revealed to be Mr. 0, the leader of Baroque Works
One of the Seven Warlords of the Sea
Ruthless and suspicious, willing to eliminate his own agents
